VXLIB Function Reference

Sobel 3x3

OpenVX Function Description

  • Implements the Sobel Image Filter Kernel.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/da/d4b/group__group__vision__function__sobel3x3.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_sobel_3x3_i8u_o16s_o16s : Input image is U8 format and output images are S16 format
  • VXLIB_sobelX_3x3_i8u_o16s : Input image is U8 format and output image is S16 format
  • VXLIB_sobelY_3x3_i8u_o16s : Input image is U8 format and output image is S16 format
